text:
FortressIQ | San Francisco, CA | Onsite | Front/Back-End & Windows Developers, Data Scientists

We're building a data platform to help enterprise companies get the most out of their automation and AI initiatives. We're hiring several engineering positions, each of which come with a full time salary, great benefits, and early-stage equityâ€”we just raised our seed from Boldstart Ventures, Comcast Ventures and Eniac Ventures.

Data Scientist - http://www.fortressiq.com/data-scientist

Full Stack Engineer - http://www.fortressiq.com/full-stack-engineer

Front End Engineer - http://www.fortressiq.com/front-end-engineer

Windows Developer - http://www.fortressiq.com/windows-developer

All positions are full-time in downtown San Francisco, where our office is just off the Montgomery Street BART stop. Drop us a line at careers@fortressiq.com.
